name: Glob
description:
Glob is a collect-em-up game written in STOS.

You are trapped in Dr Car-acar-ton's clinic and to escape you need to eat all kinds of cakes and other delicacies that you find in the rooms of the clinic. The clinic has five floors and every floor has a different number of rooms. During your escape you will encounter many bonus items such as immunity, stop and speed. Keys will allow you to enter locked rooms. Certain rooms have been mined with time bombs, if you enter one of these rooms the bomb has to be disarmed before it blows or you will lose a life. Throughout the clinic monsters roam and if you touch one you will lose a life.

The floor of the clinic consists of tiles and there are many different tiles such as normal tiles (regular floor tiles that comes in many different colors), lava tiles (step on these and lose a life) and sliders (make you slide in a certain direction).
